summary: This document is an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing a potential visit to Staley's house in London. The communication is marked as confidential and may contain privileged information.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is reaching out to Jeffrey Epstein to arrange a visit to his house in London.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is responding to Jes Staley's inquiry about visiting his house.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are communicating about a personal visit, indicating a social relationship.

keyFacts: The email exchange took place on October 18 and 19, 2009.
Jes Staley is asking if he can visit Jeffrey Epstein's house in London.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
